title: Kevin Vermaerke Impatient for Breakout After Steady WorldTour Rise: ‘I Need to Start Winning Races’
content:
'My first pro win is a top goal this season': Vermaerke, one of America's diamonds-in-the-rough, is betting on a breakout season in 2025.

Read the full article at Kevin Vermaerke Impatient for Breakout After Steady WorldTour Rise: ‘I Need to Start Winning Races’ on Velo.
author: ahood
